Public Class WebHeaderCollection Inherits NameValueCollection Implements ISerializable
type WebHeaderCollection = class inherit NameValueCollection interface ISerializable

summary.span: 包含與要求或回應關聯的通訊協定 (Protocol) 標頭。

span.span: Contains protocol headers associated with a request or response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別通常透過存取或。The class is generally accessed through or . 某些常見的標頭被視為受限制，且可能是直接由 API 公開 (例如`Content-Type`) 或受保護的系統，且無法變更。Some common headers are considered restricted and are either exposed directly by the API (such as `Content-Type`) or protected by the system and cannot be changed. 受限制的標頭如下：The restricted headers are: - 接受Accept - 連線Connection - 內容長度Content-Length - Content-TypeContent-Type - 日期Date - 預期Expect - 主機Host - 如果修改自If-Modified-Since - 範圍Range - 推薦者Referer - 傳輸編碼方式Transfer-Encoding - 使用者代理程式User-Agent - Proxy 連線Proxy-Connection

summary.span: 將指定標頭插入至集合。

span.span: Inserts the specified header into the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `header`參數必須指定 「 名稱： 值 」 格式。The `header` parameter must be specified in the format "name:value". 如果指定的標頭不存在於集合中，新的標頭會加入至集合。If the specified header does not exist in the collection, a new header is added to the collection. 如果在指定的標頭`header`已經是存在於集合中的值部分`header`串連現有值。If the header specified in `header` is already present in the collection, the value part of the `header` is concatenated with the existing value. ## Examples 下列範例會將名稱/值組使用方法。The following example adds a name/value pair to a using the Method. span.span: if the header is restricted; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回`true`來表示標頭限制和必須使用屬性而不直接設定或由系統設定。The method returns `true` to indicate that a header is restricted and must be set using properties instead of directly or is set by the system. 受限制的標頭如下：The restricted headers are: - 接受Accept - 連線Connection - 內容長度Content-Length - Content-TypeContent-Type - 日期Date - 預期Expect - 主機Host - 如果修改自If-Modified-Since - 範圍Range - 推薦者Referer - 傳輸編碼方式Transfer-Encoding - 使用者代理程式User-Agent - Proxy 連線Proxy-Connection ## Examples 下列範例會檢查以查看禁止任何標頭所設定的屬性。The following example checks the property to see if any headers are prohibited from being set. [!code-cpp[WebHeaderCollection_IsRestricted#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebHeaderCollection_IsRestricted/CPP/webheadercollection_isrestricted.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebHeaderCollection_IsRestricted#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebHeaderCollection_IsRestricted/CS/webheadercollection_isrestricted.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebHeaderCollection_IsRestricted#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebHeaderCollection_IsRestricted/VB/webheadercollection_isrestricted.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回`true`，指出要求或回應的標頭是受限制和必須使用屬性而不直接設定或由系統設定。The method returns `true` to indicate that a request or response header is restricted and must be set using properties instead of directly or is set by the system. 受限制的標頭如下：The restricted headers are: - 接受Accept - 連線Connection - 內容長度Content-Length - Content-TypeContent-Type - 日期Date - 預期Expect - 主機Host - 如果修改自If-Modified-Since - 範圍Range - 推薦者Referer - 傳輸編碼方式Transfer-Encoding - 使用者代理程式User-Agent - Proxy 連線Proxy-Connection ## Examples 下列範例會檢查禁止不需設定的屬性，以查看是否任何要求標頭。The following example checks the property to see if any request headers are prohibited from being set.
